title: Salisbury Police Investigate Two Separate Shootings
summary: Police are investigating two separate shootings in Salisbury that resulted in serious injuries to the victims.
charlotte_impact: Highlights ongoing public safety concerns and the need for community vigilance in Salisbury.

title: I-77S Toll Lane Project Sparks Community Concerns
summary: Proposed I-77 toll lane expansion raises tensions over its potential impact on historically Black neighborhoods in west Charlotte.
charlotte_impact: Addresses the intersection of infrastructure development, community equity, and historical preservation.

title: Asha Degree's Parents Continue Search After 26 Years
summary: Asha Degree's parents plead for answers 26 years after her disappearance, vowing to continue their search for the truth.
charlotte_impact: Keeps the unsolved case in the public eye and underscores the enduring pain of families with missing children.

title: Weekend Weather Forecast: Spotty Rain, Cooler Temperatures
summary: The weekend forecast includes scattered rain on Saturday morning and Sunday, with cooler temperatures expected by Sunday.
charlotte_impact: Provides routine weather information relevant to weekend planning for local residents.

title: Landslide Mapping Program Stalled Before Helene Slides
summary: North Carolina's landslide mapping program was stalled for years before the Helene slides, leaving many without critical safety information.
charlotte_impact: Exposes potential failures in state-level disaster preparedness and risk assessment.

title: Man Charged with Murder in East Charlotte Shooting
summary: A man has been charged with murder following a fatal shooting at a Food Lion in east Charlotte, which endangered bystanders.
charlotte_impact: Addresses gun violence and its impact on public safety in Charlotte.

title: Climate Change Impacts Coffee Production Globally
summary: Warming temperatures in coffee-growing regions are impacting coffee prices and the ability to grow coffee.
charlotte_impact: Connects global climate change to local economic impacts and consumer habits.

title: Sebastian Bach to Perform Sold-Out Show in Newton
summary: Sebastian Bach is set to perform a sold-out show in Newton, NC, as part of his 'Party Never Ends' tour.
charlotte_impact: Highlights local entertainment options and the region's appeal to touring artists.

title: Daycare Teacher Sentenced After Burning Child with Hot Glue
summary: A daycare teacher was sentenced after burning a child with hot glue, sparking outrage among childcare safety advocates.
charlotte_impact: Raises serious concerns about childcare safety and accountability.

title: Charlotte Chef Wins Lottery, Plans Food Truck
summary: Charlotte chef Jose Naranjo won a $171K Cash 5 jackpot and plans to launch a food truck.
charlotte_impact: Showcases local entrepreneurship and the potential for personal success stories.

title: Charlotte's Dining Scene Faces Challenges
summary: Charlotte's restaurant scene is growing, but rising costs are causing closures of long-standing eateries.
charlotte_impact: Reflects the economic pressures facing local businesses in a competitive market.

title: Report Released on Fire That Killed Denny Hamlin's Father
summary: Officials release the final report in the house fire that resulted in the death of NASCAR driver Denny Hamlin's father in Gaston County.
charlotte_impact: Provides closure and details surrounding a tragic event involving a prominent local figure.

title: Joe Gibbs Racing Sues Ex-Crew Chief
summary: Joe Gibbs Racing sues ex-crew chief Chris Gabehart for allegedly sharing confidential car data with a rival NASCAR team.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the competitive and secretive nature of professional racing.

title: 4-Year-Old Killed in Rock Hill Shootout
summary: A 4-year-old and a 19-year-old man were killed in a Rock Hill shootout late Tuesday night.
charlotte_impact: Underscores the tragic consequences of gun violence, especially involving children.

title: Mixed-Income Neighborhood Planned for Former Mill Site
summary: A former mill site in Salisbury is set to become a mixed-income neighborhood, the result of community engagement and analysis.
charlotte_impact: Demonstrates efforts to address housing affordability and community development in Salisbury.
